name: Speechless
description:
Rose is the scent of love
And the thorns is the poison
Love is something that we can feel
Love is something that we can't think
Some people say that love is about how we see
Some people say that love is blind.

We can say that we love someone
But, words never describe anything about love
Love wants us to listen our hearts
But, listening is something hard for a lover
We need all the senses to feel in love
But, any senses seems to stop working.

This oil painting is from 2010. In that year, I explored many ideas about self portrait and tried to share something personal into my art. And this is my favorite one from self portrait series in 2010.

Fadhlil abdi
